#! /usr/bin/env python

# GUI module generated by PAGE version 4.22
#  in conjunction with Tcl version 8.6
#    Apr 27, 2019 02:27:22 PM HST  platform: Linux

import sys

try:
    import Tkinter as tk
except ImportError:
    import tkinter as tk

try:
    import ttk
    py3 = False
except ImportError:
    import tkinter.ttk as ttk
    py3 = True

import Mainmenu_support

def vp_start_gui():
    '''Starting point when module is the main routine.'''
    global val, w, root
    root = tk.Tk()
    top = StartMenu (root)
    Mainmenu_support.init(root, top)
    root.mainloop()

w = None
def create_StartMenu(root, *args, **kwargs):
    '''Starting point when module is imported by another program.'''
    global w, w_win, rt
    rt = root
    w = tk.Toplevel (root)
    top = StartMenu (w)
    Mainmenu_support.init(w, top, *args, **kwargs)
    return (w, top)

def destroy_StartMenu():
    global w
    w.destroy()
    w = None

class StartMenu:
    def __init__(self, top=None):
        '''This class configures and populates the toplevel window.
           top is the toplevel containing window.'''
        _bgcolor = '#d9d9d9'  # X11 color: 'gray85'
        _fgcolor = '#000000'  # X11 color: 'black'
        _compcolor = '#d9d9d9' # X11 color: 'gray85'
        _ana1color = '#d9d9d9' # X11 color: 'gray85'
        _ana2color = '#ececec' # Closest X11 color: 'gray92'

        top.geometry("600x450+368+124")
        top.title("CarDB")
        top.configure(highlightcolor="black")

        self.InsertButton = tk.Button(top)
        self.InsertButton.place(relx=0.1, rely=0.222, height=28, width=73)
        self.InsertButton.configure(activebackground="#f9f9f9")
        self.InsertButton.configure(text='''Insert''')

        self.QueryButton = tk.Button(top)
        self.QueryButton.place(relx=0.1, rely=0.333, height=28, width=74)
        self.QueryButton.configure(activebackground="#f9f9f9")
        self.QueryButton.configure(text='''Query''')

        self.RemoveButton = tk.Button(top)
        self.RemoveButton.place(relx=0.1, rely=0.467, height=28, width=76)
        self.RemoveButton.configure(activebackground="#f9f9f9")
        self.RemoveButton.configure(text='''Remove''')

        self.Intro = tk.Label(top)
        self.Intro.place(relx=0.05, rely=0.044, height=28, width=546)
        self.Intro.configure(activebackground="#f9f9f9")
        self.Intro.configure(text='''Thank you for using the car databse!''')

        self.TableExButton = tk.Button(top)
        self.TableExButton.place(relx=0.1, rely=0.6, height=28, width=104)
        self.TableExButton.configure(activebackground="#f9f9f9")
        self.TableExButton.configure(text='''Export Table''')

        self.QueryExButton = tk.Button(top)
        self.QueryExButton.place(relx=0.1, rely=0.733, height=28, width=108)
        self.QueryExButton.configure(activebackground="#f9f9f9")
        self.QueryExButton.configure(text='''Export Query''')

        self.Insertinfo = tk.Label(top)
        self.Insertinfo.place(relx=0.333, rely=0.222, height=18, width=186)
        self.Insertinfo.configure(activebackground="#f9f9f9")
        self.Insertinfo.configure(text='''Insert a car into the database''')

        self.Queryinfo = tk.Label(top)
        self.Queryinfo.place(relx=0.333, rely=0.333, height=18, width=196)
        self.Queryinfo.configure(activebackground="#f9f9f9")
        self.Queryinfo.configure(text='''Query the database for car info''')

        self.removeinfo = tk.Label(top)
        self.removeinfo.place(relx=0.333, rely=0.467, height=18, width=206)
        self.removeinfo.configure(activebackground="#f9f9f9")
        self.removeinfo.configure(text='''Remove a car from the database''')

        self.tableExinfo = tk.Label(top)
        self.tableExinfo.place(relx=0.3, rely=0.6, height=18, width=206)
        self.tableExinfo.configure(activebackground="#f9f9f9")
        self.tableExinfo.configure(text='''Export a table to a .csv file''')

        self.queryExinfo = tk.Label(top)
        self.queryExinfo.place(relx=0.333, rely=0.733, height=18, width=127)
        self.queryExinfo.configure(activebackground="#f9f9f9")
        self.queryExinfo.configure(text='''Export query results''')

if __name__ == '__main__':
    vp_start_gui()
